name: Wild Bloom
description:
Match 3 or more gems to clear the board in the magical world of Wild Bloom. Take on puzzles with the help of a colorful cast of creatures. Don't let their whimsical nature fool you, they each have powerful skills that can be unleashed to swing the tides in your favor. Level them up and test their prowess against other players in real-time matches. Start shaking up this puzzle world today!

Features:
*MATCH 3 or more gems to beat the stages
*COLLECT AND LEVEL UP your creatures to discover their special powers
*DUELS lets you put your puzzle prowess against other players around the globe
*ABILITIES and power gems let you swing the tides in your favor
